snippet: In their monthly newsletter to employees, the chief executive of the Jefferies Group and the chairman of the executive committee implored the company’s nearly 4,000 employees to rethink how they approach their business and their lives.
abstract: In their monthly newsletter to employees, the chief executive of the Jefferies Group and the chairman of the executive committee implored the company’s nearly 4,000 employees to rethink how they approach their business and their lives.

headline.main: Leaders of Jefferies Cheer: Give Us B-E-T-T-E-R
